meaningMnemonic: You have to <radical>sell</radical> <radical>thread</radical> if you want to <kanji>continue</kanji> to live. You want to make a living don’t you? Make sure you continue to sell that thread every single day!
readingMnemonic: You have to <kanji>continue</kanji> to sell that thread because a Boso<reading>zoku</reading> (ぞく) bike gang is forcing you to do it. You see? If you want to continue to live, you have to appease this Bosozoku gang. You better keep selling!
